<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scamper](/Feats.aspx?ID=5616) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=759" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 22 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Requirements**
You are adjacent to at least one enemy.

</column>

---

You Stride up to your Speed, with a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement. You must end this movement in a space that's not adjacent to any enemy.
name: Scamper
requirement: You are adjacent to at least one enemy.
